page.title: 13Carlton Ghost
page.content: The"Oddfellows"pub in Carlton has a ghost! The landlord said it was a figure dressed as a cavalier. The landlady has never sensed it. However when the landlord and landlady were on holiday their friends looked ater the pub. Their dog barked every time it went into their bedroom, and when Mr.and Mrs.X went to bed they got the feeling of someone lifting up the mattress. They are convinced it was the ghost The landlord's sister-in-law sensed it too. She was upstairs alone watching TV. She went downstairs and when she came back the TV was off. There was no_else else upstairs. Apparently the pub was built in l75O on the site of some some stables where a man had committed suicide. Ever since there have been ghostly tales!
